segments.text: In this cozy kitchen filled with warmth, I spot the children sharing a secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little plans unfold as the boy reaches for cookies, excitement written all over his face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then my heart drops as I see how unsteady the stool is beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so content, yet I can't help but feel a wave of anxiety for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical, her obliviousness as water spills and chaos brews behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think how quickly joy can turn into a mess, and I feel my frustration grow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What I wish is for her to just look around and see whatâ€™s happening right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
